item.title: chernobyl-cesium-137
item.author: pmassicotte@hotmail.com (Philippe Massicotte)
item.description: df <- readxl::read_excel( "c:/Users/pmass/Downloads/CHERNAIR.xls", na = c("<", "", "N", "L") ) %>% janitor::clean_names() %>% mutate(date = lubridate::ymd(date)) %>% mutate(date_time = make_datetime( year(date), month(date), day(date), hour(end_of_sampling), minute(end_of_sampling), second(end_of_sampling) )) Map world <- ne_countries(scale = "medium", returnclass = "sf") df2 <- df %>% count(pays, ville, x, y) %>% st_as_sf( coords = c("x", "y"), crs = "+proj=longlat +datum=WGS84" ) %>% st_transform(st_crs(world)) world_points <- cbind(world, st_coordinates(st_centroid(world$geometry))) #> Warning in st_centroid.sfc(world$geometry): st_centroid does not give #> correct centroids for longitude/latitude data world %>% ggplot() + geom_sf(size = 0.
